name: Name
serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
unexpectedError: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or return to the home page.
pageNotFoundMessage: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved. Check the URL or navigate back home.
errorLoadingPageMessage: We encountered an error while loading this page. Please try again or navigate to a different section.
errorLoadingSectionMessage: Something went wrong while loading this content. Please try again or navigate to a different section using the tabs above.
sectionErrorMessage: Something went wrong loading this content. Try refreshing or come back later.
defaultErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
familyMapsDescription: Explore your family history through interactive maps
noLocationsMessage: Add geographic information to places to see them on the map
recentChanges: Recent changes to your family tree
activityWillAppear: Activity will appear here as changes are made to your family tree.
calendarSubscriptionsDescription: Subscribe to family calendars and RSS feeds in your favorite apps
createSecureToken: Create a secure token to access private calendar feeds
giveTokenName: Give your token a name to identify it later
saveTokenSecurely: Save this token securely. You will not be able to view it again.
copyUrlsToSubscribe: Copy these URLs to subscribe in your calendar app
newTokenGenerated: New token generated! Copy the URLs below to use it.
generateOrSelectToken: Generate a new token or select an existing one to get authenticated calendar URLs.
generateOrSelectTokenForUrl: Generate or select a token to get URL
urlsIncludeToken: URLs above include your token. Copy them to subscribe in your calendar app.
stepByStepGuides: Step-by-step guides for popular calendar applications
subscribingInGoogleCalendar: Subscribing to a calendar in Google Calendar
subscribingInAppleCalendar: Subscribing to a calendar in Apple Calendar
subscribingInOutlook: Subscribing to a calendar in Outlook
rssFeedDescription: To subscribe to the RSS feed of family updates, copy the RSS URL and add it to your favorite RSS reader:
manageProfileSettings: Manage your profile and account settings
accountDetails: Your account details and authentication method
linkAccountDescription: Link your account to your person record in the family tree
haventLinkedProfile: You haven't linked your account to a person profile yet. Linking your profile allows you to edit your information and contribute to the family history.
manageCalendarTokens: Manage tokens used to subscribe to your family calendar in Apple Calendar, Google Calendar, Outlook, and other calendar apps
createAndManageTokens: Create and manage calendar subscription tokens
createTokenToSubscribe: Create a token to subscribe to your family calendar
calendarTokensAllowSubscribe: Calendar tokens allow you to subscribe to your family calendar in any calendar application that supports iCalendar (.ics) feeds.
rotationPoliciesHelp: Rotation policies help keep your calendar secure by automatically creating new tokens
whenTokenRotated: When a token is rotated, the old token remains valid for 30 days to allow time for updating your calendar subscriptions
revokingTokenDisables: Revoking a token immediately disables it and calendar subscriptions will stop working
confirmRevokeToken: Are you sure you want to revoke this token? Calendar subscriptions using this token will stop working immediately. You can delete the token after revoking it.
confirmDeleteToken: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this token? This action cannot be undone and the token will be removed from your records.
oldTokenValid30Days: Your old token will remain valid for 30 days. Update your calendar subscriptions with the new URLs below.
rotateOnPasswordChange: Rotate when I change my password
rotateOnPasswordChangeDesc: Token automatically rotates after password changes
rotateAnnuallyDesc: Token expires and rotates after 365 days
manualRotationOnlyDesc: I will manually rotate the token when needed
neverRotateDesc: Token remains valid until manually revoked
updateCalendarSubscriptions: Update your calendar subscriptions with the new URLs below.
subscribeToRss: Subscribe to updates via RSS reader
